sections.heading: executions or orders of sale; when authorized
sections.text: Successive executions or orders of sale may issue at any time after the return of the officer not sold for want of bidders at the request of the plaintiff or his attorney.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 495, p. 477;R.S.1913, ยง 8073;Laws 1915, c. 149, ยง 2, p. 319;
